snippet.title: Rogue Lords | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1069690/Rogue_Lords/

Many moons ago, mortals led by Demon Hunters rose up against the Devil in an attempt to cleanse the world of his divine corruption. Now, after years of banishment, the time of reckoning has come.

#RogueLords will be available in 2021 on Steam, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.

-------------------------------
